works.description:
REPEAT INFRINGEMENT NOTICE

DMCA Notice of Copyright Infringement ("Notice")

Regarding:

<http://hikarinoakarianime.blogspot.com> (the "Blog")


To Whom It May Concern,

I am contacting you on behalf of AMUSE Inc., Amuse Soft Entertainment
Inc., Universal Music LLC and Tokuma Japan Communications Co., Ltd.
(the "Companies"), we, AMUSE Inc., are hereby notifying you we have
found the below-mentioned material(s) infringing the Copyrights of the
Companies and request immediate removal the file(s) from your service.

The infringing material(s) appear on the Service for which you are the
designated agent. The URL(s) of the infringing material listed below
are specific blog-post(s) linking to file(s) containing video and/or
sound recordings, music, remixes and/or mash-ups, live bootlegs, live
performances, music scores, booklets, covers, labels, photobooks,
photographic and/or visual images, documents for other users to
download by our artist(s). The copyright in these work(s) is owned by
the Companies and has not been authorized for this kind of use.

We are asking for your immediate assistance in stopping this
unauthorized activity. Specifically, we request that you remove the
infringing material(s) from your system, or that you disable access to
the material(s), and that you inform the blog-operator(s) on the
Service of the illegality of his or her conduct.


***********************
* REPEAT INFRINGEMENT *
***********************

WE HAVE PREVIOUSLY NOTIFIED YOU OF INFRINGING MATERIALS ON THE SAME BLOG
MORE THAN ONCE:

<http://hikarinoakarianime.blogspot.com>

#01 - Notified on 2012-04-04 (UTC+09:00)
       See DMCA Notice [#998387569]
       3 blog-posts

#02 - Notified on 2012-04-06 (UTC+09:00)
       See DMCA Notice [#998387569] (reply)
       3 Reappeared blog-posts

#03 - Notified on 2012-04-10 (UTC+09:00)
       See DMCA Notice [#1001620686]
       1 New blog-post

#04 - Notified on 2012-04-12 (UTC+09:00)
       See DMCA Notice [#1001620686] (reply)
       1 Reappeared blog-post

and

#05 - This Notice (1 New blog-post)


Despite repeated Notices, the Blog continue to reupload and post,
without the relevant permissions, links to files the copyright in
which are owned by us. We are again asking for your immediate
assistance in stopping this unauthorized activity.

Given the blog operaters' conduct in continuing the unauthorized
posting of links to copyrighted work(s) on the Blog site, we further
request that Google removes the Blog and terminates the account of
the operator(s) of the Blog for REPEAT INFRINGEMENT in accordance
with its DMCA and Blogger's Terms of Service.


We hereby state that we have a good faith belief that use of the
material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the
copyright owner, its agents, or the law.

The information in this Notice is accurate and we swear, under penalty
of perjury, that we are the copyright owner or are authorized to act
on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly
infringed.


COPYRIGHTED WORK(S) OR RIGHT(S)

Infringed Artist: Perfume
Infringed Title: Spring of Life [c/w "Communication"]
Catalog Number: UPCP-9001 / UPCP-5001
JAN: 4988005706706 / 4988005706713


REPEAT INFRINGER(s)

tsuba - chan
